name: Crazy Music Fun HD – FULL FREE Edition
name_original: Crazy Music Fun HD – FULL FREE Edition
description:
"A soundboard for kids. Simple to use, fun. A Super App!" (from apps4idevices.com)

Ready for a New Crazy Music Experience? Try it now! It's FREE!!! It's a FULL version!!! Download it now and suggest to your friends!

Try a completely new, fun, exciting, relaxing and absolutely crazy sound music experience! It's not only a game, it's not really a serious music utility! It's simply an original auditive, tactile and visual "mad" app experiment for "kids" of all ages! You'll adore or hate it... are you "crazy" enough to try it?


Some features:
* Modern (CD) and Classic (Vinyl) skins.
* 120 high quality sounds (230+ in the paid version).
* Expressly and exclusively designed for the iPad, with a beautiful, immediate and intuitive user interface.
* Record and re-play your composition.
* Solo play feature. Let the iPad express its own creativity composing a song...
* Beautiful graphic.
* Playable for everybody and anybody!
* Really fun for all ages!
* iOS 4 multitasking support.
* Do you have additional features/improvements to suggest for the next update? Just contact me!

*** And have fun making your crazy music compositions! ***

Thanks for using our products. Feedback is always welcome to: support@dighentis.com
App Store reviews are greatly appreciated, thank you.
